creditline: Gift of Frederick T. and Margaret M. Boehm
description: scene with brown and gray buildings with black trim, black roofs, and a red awning over a white, paneled door on L; Japanese characters on red awning and on white sign on upper roof top at L; gray foreground
inscription: BC in pencil: Gion in Kyoto (H) | LR in pencil: 1964 | LR in pencil: 85/100
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Gion in Kyoto (H)
